content: Moderator hat off, grandpa hat on. Nope it ain’t fair, at all, We got a call this afternoon from our granddaughter in AF BMT. She graduates in on Memorial Day weekend. She called to tell us we would have to be guest of her mother that weekend, because as a CW3 her grandmother and I would only as one of the spectators. However, VIP status would be given to her mother, NOT because she is the mother of a graduate, but because she’s an E9. E9 and O6s and above are granted VIP status. I guess my daughter has been right all the time – E9s do out rank W3s. I feel like Rodney Dangerfield, I don’t get any respect at all. Life is good when you are a grandfather. God and the soldier, All men adore, In time of trouble, And no more; For when war is over, And all things righted, God is neglected - The old soldier slighted. Founding Member Original DVG & Proud Member, Rupterd Duck/Derelict Veterans

content: Congrats to the soon to be AIRMAN! Enjoy the graduation...sounds like you are gonna have some good seats, pretty sure gonna be pretty hot in Texas, hydrate well. Hey...about the rank thing...can't be right all the time...let her relish the knowledge.
